definitions.definition: A gymnastic and recreational device consisting of a piece of taut , strong fabric or rubber stretched over a (usually steel ) frame using many coiled springs as anchors .
A competitive sport in which athletes are judged on routines of tricks performed on a trampoline.
Any of a variety of looping or jumping instructions in specific programming languages .
Any of a variety of indirection techniques in specific programming languages .

main_definition: A gymnastic and recreational device consisting of a piece of taut , strong fabric or rubber stretched over a (usually steel ) frame using many coiled springs as anchors .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) A competitive sport in which athletes are judged on routines of tricks performed on a trampoline.
( programming ) Any of a variety of looping or jumping instructions in specific programming languages .
( programming ) Any of a variety of indirection techniques in specific programming languages .
